sections.heading: Commission; members; terms.The term of a member of the commission shall be three years and until his or her successor is appointed and qualified
sections.text: No member shall serve more than three consecutive three-year terms.SourceLaws 1987, LB 145, ยง 14;Laws 2003, LB 219, ยง 2;Laws 2011, LB394, ยง 4.
